hero.headline: Live in a Healthy Body
hero.bio: Hi, I am Iryna! An experienced massage therapist and certified Nordic Walking instructor with over 7 years of experience

problem.headline: If You Are Experiencing
problem.subtitle: Your body and mind need help
problem.img_problem_alt: Tired woman experiencing stress and fatigue. Signs of burnout, muscle tension, and exhaustion.

HomePage.solution: Find the perfect wellness plan designed to your body’s needs

massage_therapy.name: Massage Therapy
massage_therapy.description: Relieve pain, reduce stress, and restore balance with expert massage therapy. Whether you're looking for deep relaxation, pain relief, or posture correction, our tailored treatments—including full body, hot stone, lymphatic drainage, and anti-aging massage—help you feel your best.
massage_therapy.img_service_alt: Professional massage therapy for pain relief, stress reduction, and posture correction. Full body, hot stone, lymphatic drainage, and anti-aging massage treatments for deep relaxation and well-being.

posture_correction.name: Personalized Sessions
posture_correction.description: Our personalized posture correction sessions focus on identifying imbalances, improving alignment, and restoring mobility. Using massage therapy and movement-based techniques, we create a tailored plan to help you move pain-free.
posture_correction.img_service_alt: Personalized posture correction sessions to improve alignment, restore mobility, and relieve pain. Tailored massage therapy and movement-based techniques for better posture and pain-free movement.

nordic_walking_groups.name: Nordic Walking Groups
nordic_walking_groups.description: Improve your posture, strength, and endurance with Nordic walking, a full-body workout that engages 90% of your muscles. This low-impact yet highly effective exercise is perfect for all ages, helping to improve cardiovascular health, burn calories, and enhance joint mobility. Plus, it's a great way to meet new people and enjoy the outdoors.
nordic_walking_groups.img_service_alt: Group Nordic walking training for posture improvement, full-body strength, and endurance. Low-impact exercise engaging 90% of muscles, enhancing cardiovascular health, burning calories, and improving joint mobility in a social outdoor setting.

testimonials.headline: Real Stories, Real Results
testimonials.subtitle: Verified by Fresha
testimonials.description: Hear from our clients and discover how our personalized wellness approach has improved their lives
testimonials.review1: Iryna’s massage therapy completely changed how I feel in my body!
testimonials.review2: The Nordic walking sessions are not just fitness—they are community and fun!

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description:
At Wellness Studio, our mission is to help you move freely, feel strong, and live without limits. We believe that true wellness comes from balance — between body and mind, strength and relaxation, movement and stillness.
Founded by Iryna, an experienced massage therapist and certified Nordic Walking Instructor, Wellness Studio is more than just a place for healing — it is a space for transformation. With over seven years of expertise in therapeutic massage, posture correction, and holistic movement, Iryna combines scientific knowledge with a deep passion for helping others.
At Wellness Studio, we offer a tailored approach to healing, combining advanced massage techniques with movement-based therapies like Nordic Walking. Whether you are recovering from injury, seeking relief from chronic pain, or looking to enhance your overall vitality, we are here to support you — every step of the way. You are never too old, too injured, or too late to start. Let's move forward — together.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Message from the Founder
aboutMe.description:
In 2006, my life changed in an instant. A broken leg, four surgeries, and a long rehabilitation process left me facing a future filled with uncertainty. Doctors couldn't guarantee that I would ever walk, run, or dance again. But I refused to accept those limitations. Through dedicated training, expert guidance, and relentless perseverance, I not only regained my mobility—I discovered a passion for movement, healing, and helping others do the same.

This journey led me to study massage therapy, anatomy, and movement science. Over the years, I have had the privilege of working with people of all ages and backgrounds, guiding them toward stronger, healthier bodies. What I've learned is simple: movement is freedom. Pain and stiffness should never hold you back from living fully. That's why I created this space—to support, inspire, and empower you on your own journey to wellness. Whether through massage, posture-focused exercises, or Nordic walking, my mission is to help you feel comfortable, capable, and confident in your body. You are never too old, too injured, or too late to start. Let's move forward—together.

items.name: Certified Kobido Lifting Massage Specialist
items.description: Iryna is a master of Kobido lifting massage, an advanced Japanese technique that naturally sculpts and rejuvenates the skin.

items.name: Professional Diploma in Massage Therapy
items.description: With a strong foundation in anatomy, physiology, and posture correction, Iryna holds a professional diploma in massage therapy. Her expertise covers various massage techniques, including: Sport Massage, Medical Massage, Palpation Anatomy, Abhyanga Massage, Cupping Massage & Body Treatments.

items.name: Certified Nordic Walking Instructor
items.description: As a Certified Nordic Walking Instructor, Iryna promotes active wellness through this full-body, low-impact workout, enhancing endurance, posture, and overall health.
